New Records: Lautaro Martínez has a tournament-leading four goals
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored twice for Argentina
Leandro Paredes blasted the penalty shot into the right post
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was playing without Lionel Messi due to a leg injury
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni was suspended
Argentina assistant Walter Samuel took Scaloni's place
Post-Match Reflections: Messi is still day to day and getting better
Argentina controlled possession for the third straight match
Peru was held without a goal for the third game of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of about 64,000 fans at the Miami Dolphins' Hard Rock Stadium
Most fans cheered for Argentina while wearing different versions of Messi's No. 10 jersey
Argentina will learn its knockout stage opponent when Group B finishes on Sunday
